Issue.creator: rohitadivi
Issue.summary: Corrupting a channel transaction before making a config update should fail
Issue.description: The network is brought up using byfn with 1.1 capabilities enabled, config update is made by fetching the latest config block and adding a new org. The final proto is signed by Org 1 Admin and before sending the update from Org 2 Admin a character of the cert is changed in the pb and the config update fails as expected as the pb file is corrupted with a different value.
